name: Sealed Blaze Maiden, Bavsargra
effect:

name: Sealed Blaze Sword, Prithivih
effect:
Right Deity Arms - "Sealed Blaze Maiden, Bavsargra" (After being played, the specified vanguard Arms it. If a new Right Deity Arms is Armed, put this card into the drop)
Play this with [COST][Soul-Blast 1]!
[AUTO](VC):When the unit Armed with this card attacks, that Armed unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of that battle. At the end of that battle, if your opponent's damage zone has four or less cards, [COST][Counter-Blast 2 & put this card into your drop], choose one of your opponent's vanguards, and deal one damage.
